product_name: Sunlite Trailer Tot Bike Trailer - Double - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With a powder-coated alloy frame for durability and light weight, the Sunlite Trailer Tot Bike Trailer makes it easy to take 2 kids along for the ride. Built-in adjustable seats accommodate 2 children and have a maximum capacity of 100 lbs. Quick release wheels, wheel guards and mounting system make assembly and breakdown easy, and trailer folds up for compact storage. Durable 600-denier polyester material features a roll-up weather window. Sunlite Trailer Tot Bike Trailer weighs 23 lbs. Includes a safety flag and reflectors. Closeout.
short_description: With a powder-coated alloy frame for durability and light weight, the Sunlite Trailer Tot Bike Trailer makes it easy to take 2 kids along for the ride.
